## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G17990](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G17990)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>pat1, TRP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** PHOSPHORIBOSYLANTHRANILATE TRANSFERASE 1, tryptophan biosynthesis 1
- **Description:**   tryptophan biosynthesis 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT5G17990.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT5G17990.1)
## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS6247]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;severe tryptophan auxotroph (requires tryptophan); blue fluorescence under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; very small, yellow green plants, slow growing, bushy inflorescence with numerous lateral branches, abnormal flowers, reduced fertility
   - [CS8157]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;tryptophan auxotroph; blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV radiation; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; slow growing and stunted plants; bushy inflorescence with numerous lateral branches; abnormal flowers, reduced fertility.
   - [CS8158]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;tryptophan auxotroph; blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV radiation; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; slow growing and stunted plants; bushy inflorescence with numerous lateral branches; abnormal flowers, reduced fertility, segregating for glabra, gl1 (lacks trichomes on stems and leaves) and segregating for trp1-2.
   - [CS8159]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;tryptophan auxotroph (requires tryptophan); blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; slow growing and stunted plants; bushy inflorescence with numerous lateral branches; abnormal flowers, reduced fertility.
   - [CS8161]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate.
   - [CS8162]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;trp1-101: blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; gl1-1: lacks trichomes on stems and leaves.
   - [CS8163]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate.
   - [CS8164]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; yellow seeds, probably due to close linkage to tt4 mutation.
   - [CS8165]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;weakly blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate; slight cross-resistance to analogs of other amino acids; lacks trichomes on stems and leaves.
   - [CS8166]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;very weakly blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate.
   - [CS8167]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;blue fluorescent under long and short wave UV light; resistant to 5-methylanthranilate and 6-methylanthranilate.
   - [SALK_142670]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Ovule abortion.
